title: Textile, 1760–85
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Black grazed percale printed in poylchrome design of detached floral sprays in rows. Four different bouquets in repeat. One width (two selvages present) hemmed and lined at bottom, gathered on to drawstring with silk tassels at top showing that this is half of a petticoat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1760–85.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. 1958-128-3.
